TopicTitle: Solar Panel Setup and Animation in Unity

Articles.Content:
Hey all, 

I'm asking for myself, and other mod-authors out there. I have yet to see a really in-depth tutorial on how to setup and animate solar panels in Unity. I'm really pretty new to modding. I've been messing around with it for days, and I can't find any resources that can help me out.

My setup:

Wings3D for modeling

Photoshop for texturing

Unity for animation and everything else. 

My first set of solar panels are ESA ATV replica panels. 

> 
> ![Cr8vpGE.png](http://i.imgur.com/Cr8vpGE.png)
> 
> ![DP7vQic.png](http://i.imgur.com/DP7vQic.png)
> 
> ![FLDieCg.png](http://i.imgur.com/FLDieCg.png)
> 
> ![8Epof30.png](http://i.imgur.com/8Epof30.png)
> 
> ![eCXm3uL.png](http://i.imgur.com/eCXm3uL.png)
> 
> ![DdG0dUz.png](http://i.imgur.com/DdG0dUz.png)
> 
> 

I just want to be able to set up sun tracking, tell Unity which part of the model is the photovoltaic surface, and setup complex animations in Unity. Rather than animating each and every component, is there a way I can set up joints that are somewhat intuitive?

Thanks in advance. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![wplpgLt.png](http://i.imgur.com/wplpgLt.png)

The parts rotator and those parented to it are just the panels themselves and don't do anything for the panels sun tracking abilities.

If you want to see multiple working solar panels in action (also: nearly every part in the game) , download my VSR master folder [here](http://www./download/my57w7lkxoqwsvy/VSR-MASTER.zip).

Though it is 1.2Gb so... fair warning! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
